commitResults.messageTitle: Level-0: rename chatbot to Bobby and add greeting
Level - 1. Echo - Print initial greeting once - Continuously read user input and echo it back - Terminate program when user enters "bye" and print goodbye message
Changed bot name from Bobby to Slave, added Task class with status formatting helpers
commitResults.messageBody:
- Changed greeting, doRequest and goodbye texts
- Add Task model to store name and done status
- Provide getStatusIcon() for [X]/[ ] display
- Provide toPrintStatus() to format tasks consistently

commitResults.messageTitle: Level-3: Added function to print status of task done/undone - if user enters mark and a number, it will mark isDone as TRUE and print X - if user enters unmark and a number, it will mark isDone as FALSE and print X - changed name of list to listOfTasks - changed name of count to numberOfTasks
Level-3, Added check condition for input of mark - Added checks so that mark will only take in int

Input handling hardened and task creation delayed - Trim user input and skip empty/whitespace-only lines. - Validate mark/unmark commands for missing task numbers with clearer messaging. - Enforce numeric task numbers via Integer.parseInt with error handling. - Defer task creation until after the bye check.
